summary:
> LINK · 'Long Waits in A & E' by Hope Of The States on YouTube
How unexpected and how wonderful it is to hear new music from HotS in 2024.  Only heard this new 12-minute track a few times but it's very reminiscent of Black Dollar Bills and just as good as anything from their two albums twenty flipping years ago. 
Excited
title: > New music from Hope Of The States (!)

summary:
In the post The Art of Noticing, Andy Hawthorne writes about the importance of paying attention when it comes to photography.  He describes how his alertness allowed him to capture an interesting and beautiful photo. 
In his text, Andy also quotes the photographer Elliot Erwitt:

All the technique in the world doesn’t compensate for an inability to notice...
title: Attentive Blogging
